name: The Woman in the Cave
description:
Game in development for the Games for Blind Gamers 2 Game Jam.

This is an open ended game, where you are drawing in a cave. The game will generate a story based on your drawings. (Work in progress, the story may be incomplete)

Use Left and Right arrows to move. Use Up and Down arrows to change the design in that section of the cave. Press Enter to generate a story.

The story will change every time you press Enter.
